problems.name: Invoicing
problems.description: Manual invoicing wastes hours every week. Automate invoice creation, sending, and follow-ups to save time and get paid faster.
problems.overview: Small businesses spend 5+ hours per week on invoicing tasks: creating invoices, sending reminders, tracking payments, and following up on overdue accounts. This manual process is error-prone and delays cash flow.

painPoints.title: Time-consuming
painPoints.description: Creating and sending invoices manually takes hours each week

painPoints.title: Payment delays
painPoints.description: Clients forget to pay without automated reminders

painPoints.title: Tracking overhead
painPoints.description: Managing payment status across spreadsheets is error-prone

quickStart.title: Choose your approach
quickStart.description: Build a simple reminder bot or full invoicing platform. Start with reminders to validate demand.

quickStart.title: Integrate payment tracking
quickStart.description: Connect to accounting software (QuickBooks, Xero) or build a simple status tracker.

quickStart.title: Add automation
quickStart.description: Set up scheduled reminders, auto-generate invoices from templates, and track payment status.

problems.name: Meeting Notes
problems.description: Transform messy meeting notes into structured action items. AI can extract key decisions, tasks, and follow-ups automatically.
problems.overview: Professionals waste 2-3 hours per week organizing meeting notes. AI can parse transcripts, extract action items, assign owners, and create follow-up tasks automatically.
problems.stats: 2.3 hours/week average time spent on notes

painPoints.title: Disorganized notes
painPoints.description: Raw meeting transcripts are hard to scan and find action items

painPoints.title: Missing context
painPoints.description: Important decisions and next steps get buried in long notes

painPoints.title: No follow-up
painPoints.description: Action items aren't tracked, leading to missed deadlines

quickStart.title: Choose input method
quickStart.description: Support audio transcription (via API) or text paste. Start with text for faster MVP.

quickStart.title: Build AI parser
quickStart.description: Use GPT-4 or Claude to extract: action items, decisions, key points, and assignees.

quickStart.title: Create output format
quickStart.description: Generate structured markdown, send to task managers (Todoist, Notion), or create follow-up emails.

problems.name: Email Management
problems.description: Automate email triage, responses, and follow-ups. Reduce inbox overwhelm with AI-powered email workflows.
problems.overview: The average professional receives 120+ emails per day. Managing, responding, and following up manually consumes 2.5 hours daily. AI can triage, draft responses, and automate workflows.

painPoints.title: Inbox overload
painPoints.description: Too many emails to process manually, important messages get missed

painPoints.title: Repetitive responses
painPoints.description: Same questions require similar answers, wasting time

painPoints.title: Follow-up tracking
painPoints.description: No system to track which emails need responses or follow-ups

quickStart.title: Connect email API
quickStart.description: Use Gmail API or IMAP to read emails. Start with Gmail for easier OAuth.

quickStart.title: Build AI classifier
quickStart.description: Categorize emails (urgent, spam, needs response) and draft replies using GPT-4.

quickStart.title: Add automation
quickStart.description: Auto-respond to common queries, create tasks from emails, and schedule follow-ups.

problems.name: Social Media
problems.description: Automate social media posting, content repurposing, and engagement. Save hours on social media management.
problems.overview: Content creators and businesses spend 5+ hours per week on social media: creating posts, scheduling, repurposing content, and engaging with followers. Automation can handle most of this.

painPoints.title: Content creation
painPoints.description: Creating original posts for multiple platforms is time-consuming

painPoints.title: Scheduling overhead
painPoints.description: Manually posting across platforms wastes time

painPoints.title: Content repurposing
painPoints.description: Adapting one piece of content for different formats and platforms

quickStart.title: Choose platforms
quickStart.description: Start with Twitter/X and LinkedIn APIs. Add Instagram/Facebook later.

quickStart.title: Build scheduler
quickStart.description: Create a queue system to schedule posts at optimal times for each platform.

quickStart.title: Add AI repurposing
quickStart.description: Use AI to adapt long-form content (blog posts, videos) into platform-specific formats.

problems.name: Customer Support
problems.description: Automate customer support with AI chatbots, ticket routing, and knowledge base integration. Reduce support costs while improving response times.
problems.overview: Businesses spend $1.3T annually on customer support. AI can handle 60-80% of common queries, freeing human agents for complex issues. Response times drop from hours to seconds.

painPoints.title: High costs
painPoints.description: Human support agents are expensive and can't scale efficiently

painPoints.title: Slow response times
painPoints.description: Customers wait hours or days for responses to simple questions

painPoints.title: Repetitive queries
painPoints.description: Same questions asked repeatedly, wasting agent time

quickStart.title: Build knowledge base
quickStart.description: Import FAQ, documentation, and support articles. Use embeddings for semantic search.

quickStart.title: Create AI chatbot
quickStart.description: Use GPT-4 or Claude with RAG to answer questions from knowledge base. Add fallback to human agents.

quickStart.title: Add ticket routing
quickStart.description: Automatically categorize and route complex issues to the right team or agent.

problems.name: Content Creation
problems.description: Automate content generation, repurposing, and optimization. Create more content in less time with AI assistance.
problems.overview: Content creators spend 10+ hours per week creating content. AI can help with ideation, writing, editing, repurposing, and SEO optimization—cutting creation time by 50-70%.

painPoints.title: Writer's block
painPoints.description: Struggling to come up with ideas and write consistently

painPoints.title: Repurposing overhead
painPoints.description: Adapting one piece of content for multiple formats takes time

painPoints.title: SEO optimization
painPoints.description: Optimizing content for search requires research and keyword integration

quickStart.title: Choose content type
quickStart.description: Start with blog posts, social media, or email. Focus on one format first.

quickStart.title: Build AI writer
quickStart.description: Use GPT-4 or Claude to generate drafts, outlines, and variations. Add your voice/style.

quickStart.title: Add optimization
quickStart.description: Integrate SEO keyword research, readability scoring, and repurposing workflows.

problems.name: Data Entry
problems.description: Automate manual data entry with OCR, form parsing, and API integrations. Eliminate repetitive typing and reduce errors.
problems.overview: Businesses waste 20+ hours per week on manual data entry. OCR, form parsing, and API integrations can automate 80% of data entry tasks, reducing errors and freeing time.

painPoints.title: Repetitive work
painPoints.description: Typing the same data into multiple systems is tedious and error-prone

painPoints.title: Time consumption
painPoints.description: Manual entry takes hours that could be spent on higher-value work

painPoints.title: Human error
painPoints.description: Typos and mistakes require time-consuming corrections

quickStart.title: Identify data sources
quickStart.description: Choose input formats: PDFs, images, forms, emails, or spreadsheets.

quickStart.title: Build parser
quickStart.description: Use OCR (Tesseract, AWS Textract) or form parsing to extract structured data.

quickStart.title: Add validation
quickStart.description: Validate extracted data, flag errors, and integrate with destination systems (CRM, database, API).

problems.name: Scheduling
problems.description: Automate meeting scheduling, calendar management, and availability coordination. Eliminate back-and-forth emails.
problems.overview: Professionals spend 2+ hours per week coordinating meetings. Automated scheduling tools eliminate email chains, reduce no-shows, and optimize calendar usage.

painPoints.title: Email back-and-forth
painPoints.description: Coordinating meeting times via email wastes time

painPoints.title: Double bookings
painPoints.description: Manual calendar management leads to conflicts

painPoints.title: No-shows
painPoints.description: Missing reminders and confirmations result in wasted time

quickStart.title: Connect calendar APIs
quickStart.description: Integrate Google Calendar or Outlook to read availability and create events.

quickStart.title: Build booking system
quickStart.description: Create a booking page where others can see your availability and book slots.

quickStart.title: Add automation
quickStart.description: Send confirmations, reminders, and handle rescheduling automatically.

problems.name: Reporting
problems.description: Automate report generation, data aggregation, and dashboard updates. Turn hours of manual work into automated insights.
problems.overview: Teams spend 5+ hours per week creating reports: gathering data, formatting, and distributing. Automation can generate reports on schedule, pull from multiple sources, and deliver insights automatically.

painPoints.title: Manual aggregation
painPoints.description: Collecting data from multiple sources is time-consuming

painPoints.title: Formatting overhead
painPoints.description: Creating visually appealing reports takes hours

painPoints.title: Stale data
painPoints.description: Reports become outdated quickly without automation

quickStart.title: Identify data sources
quickStart.description: Connect to APIs, databases, or spreadsheets that contain report data.

quickStart.title: Build aggregator
quickStart.description: Pull data from sources, transform it, and calculate metrics automatically.

quickStart.title: Create templates
quickStart.description: Design report templates (PDF, HTML, or dashboard) and schedule automatic generation.

problems.name: Lead Generation
problems.description: Automate lead discovery, qualification, and outreach. Find prospects, enrich data, and start conversations at scale.
problems.overview: Sales teams spend 40% of their time on lead generation. Automation can discover prospects, enrich contact data, qualify leads, and initiate personalized outreach—multiplying output.
problems.stats: 40% of sales time on lead gen

painPoints.title: Manual research
painPoints.description: Finding and researching prospects takes hours per lead

painPoints.title: Low response rates
painPoints.description: Generic outreach gets ignored, requiring personalization at scale

painPoints.title: Data quality
painPoints.description: Outdated contact information wastes outreach efforts

quickStart.title: Choose lead sources
quickStart.description: Integrate with LinkedIn, company databases, or web scraping for prospect discovery.

quickStart.title: Build enrichment
quickStart.description: Use APIs (Clearbit, Hunter.io) to enrich leads with contact info and company data.

quickStart.title: Add personalization
quickStart.description: Use AI to generate personalized outreach messages based on prospect data and research.

problems.name: Knowledge Transfer
problems.description: Automate knowledge capture, documentation, and sharing. Preserve institutional knowledge and make it searchable.
problems.overview: Organizations lose knowledge when employees leave. Manual documentation is incomplete and hard to search. AI can capture knowledge from conversations, documents, and workflows, making it accessible.

painPoints.title: Knowledge loss
painPoints.description: When employees leave, their knowledge leaves with them

painPoints.title: Poor documentation
painPoints.description: Manual documentation is incomplete, outdated, and hard to find

painPoints.title: Search difficulty
painPoints.description: Finding answers in existing docs takes too long

quickStart.title: Choose capture method
quickStart.description: Capture from Slack, emails, meetings, or documents. Start with one source.

quickStart.title: Build AI processor
quickStart.description: Use embeddings and LLMs to extract, structure, and index knowledge automatically.

quickStart.title: Create search interface
quickStart.description: Build a searchable knowledge base with semantic search and Q&A interface.
